text.#text:
There is hereby imposed
				on every employer of an employee to whom this section applies and who makes an
				election to be taxed under this part a tax equal to—

19 percent of the value of excludable
				compensation provided during the calendar year by the employer for the benefit

				years beginning with the calendar year for which the election under section 60
				is made, and

17 percent of such
				excludable compensation during the calendar year in the case of all calendar
				years subsequent to the calendar years described in

The tax imposed by this section shall be paid by the
				employer.
